00018 template<
00019   class CHAR_T = char,
00020   CHAR_T* ALPHABET = a2z,
00021   uint32_t ALPHABET_SIZE = a2z_size
00022   >
00023 class AlphabetNode
00024 {
00025   
00026   struct _disk_node_
00027   {
00028     uint64_t addrs_[ALPHABET_SIZE]  ;
00029     uint32_t level_;
00030 
00031   }
00032     ;
00033   
00034   struct _node_
00035   {
00036     struct _disk_node_ diskNode_;
00037     uint32_t mem_addr_[ALPHABET_SIZE];
00038     bool dirty_;
00039     uint64_t diskPos_;
00040 
00041     inline _node_()
00042     {
00043       for (uint32_t i =0;i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00044       {
00045         mem_addr_[i] = (uint32_t)-1;
00046         diskNode_.addrs_[i] = (uint64_t)-1;
00047       }
00048       dirty_ = true;
00049       diskPos_ = (uint64_t)-1;
00050       diskNode_.level_ = (uint32_t)-1;
00051 
00052     }
00053     
00054   };
00055 
00056 public:
00057   typedef AlphabetNode<CHAR_T, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> SelfType;
00058   enum slef_size{ SIZE_= sizeof(_node_)+sizeof(_node_*)+sizeof(FILE*)}; 
00059 
00063   AlphabetNode(FILE* f)
00064     :f_(f), pNode_(NULL)
00065   {
00066     pNode_ = new struct _node_();
00067   }
00068 
00069   ~AlphabetNode()
00070   {
00071     if (pNode_!=NULL)
00072       delete pNode_;
00073     pNode_ = NULL;
00074   }

00080   ostream& display(ostream& os)
00081   {
00082     os<<"\ndis: [";
00083     for (uint32_t i=0; i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00084     {
00085       os<<pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[i]<<",";
00086     }
00087     os<<"]\n";
00088 
00089     os<<"\nmem: [";
00090     for (uint32_t i=0; i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00091     {
00092       os<<pNode_->mem_addr_[i]<<",";
00093     }
00094     os<<"]\n";
00095 
00096     os<<"level:"<<pNode_->diskNode_.level_<<" dirty:"<<pNode_->dirty_<<" disk:"<<pNode_->diskPos_<<endl;
00097 
00098     return os;
00099   }

00106   {
00107     os<<"\ndis: [";
00108     for (uint32_t i=0; i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)

00111     }
00112     os<<"]\n";
00113

00118     }
00119     os<<"]\n";
00120

00122

00131   bool load(uint64_t addr)
00132   {
00133     if (pNode_!=NULL)
00134     {
00135       update2disk();
00136       delete pNode_;
00137     }
00138     
00139     pNode_ = NULL;
00140     
00141     if (addr == (uint64_t)-1)
00142       return false;
00143 
00144       
00145     pNode_ = new struct _node_();
00146     if (fseek(f_, addr, SEEK_SET)!=0)
00147     {
00148       //throw exception
00149       return false;
00150     }
00151     
00152     if(fread(&(pNode_->diskNode_), sizeof(struct _disk_node_), 1, f_)!=1)
00153     {
00155       return false;
00156     }
00157     
00158 
00159     pNode_->dirty_ = false;
00160     pNode_->diskPos_ = addr;
00161     for (uint32_t i =0;i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00162       pNode_->mem_addr_[i] = (uint32_t)-1;
00163     
00164     return true;
00165   }
00166 
00171   uint64_t update2disk()
00172   {
00173     if (pNode_==NULL)
00174       return false;
00175 
00176     if (pNode_->dirty_)
00177     {
00178       pNode_->dirty_ = false;
00179       if (pNode_->diskPos_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00180       {
00181         return add2disk();
00182       }
00183       
00184       fseek(f_, pNode_->diskPos_, SEEK_SET);
00185       if ( fwrite(&(pNode_->diskNode_), sizeof(struct _disk_node_), 1, f_)!=1)
00186       {
00187         return (uint64_t)-1;
00188       }
00189       return pNode_->diskPos_;
00190     }
00191 
00192     return true;
00193   }
00194 
00198   uint64_t add2disk()
00199   {
00200     if (pNode_==NULL)
00201     {
00202       return (uint64_t)-1;
00203     }
00204 
00205     fseek(f_, 0, SEEK_END);
00206     uint64_t end = ftell(f_);
00207     
00208      
00209     if (end%2==0)
00210     {//alphabet node only be stored at odds address, which distinguish from bucket
00211       end = fseek(f_, 1, SEEK_END);
00212       end++;
00213     }
00214     
00215      
00216     if (fwrite(&(pNode_->diskNode_), sizeof(struct _disk_node_), 1, f_)!=1)
00217        return (uint64_t)-1;
00218 
00219     pNode_->dirty_ = 1;
00220     pNode_->diskPos_ = end;
00221     return end;
00222      
00223   }
00224 
00228   static uint32_t getIndexOf(CHAR_T ch)
00229   {
00230     if (ch<ALPHABET[0] || ch>ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1])
00231     {
00232       LDBG_<<"Can't find '"<<ch<<ALPHABET[0]<<ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1]<<"' in alphabet";
00233       return -1;
00234     }
00235     
00236     
00237     if(ALPHABET[0] == 'a' && ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1]=='z')
00238     {
00239       if (ch <= 'Z' && ch >='A')
00240         return ch-'A';
00241       return ch-ALPHABET[0];
00242     }
00243 
00244     uint32_t start = 0;
00245     uint32_t end  = ALPHABET_SIZE -1;
00246     uint32_t mid = (start + end)/2;
00247     
00248     while ( mid<=end && mid>=start)
00249     {
00250       if (ALPHABET[mid]==ch)
00251         return mid;
00252       
00253       if (ALPHABET[mid]<ch)
00254       {
00255         start = mid+1;
00256         mid = (start + end)/2;
00257         continue;
00258       }
00259 
00260       if (ALPHABET[mid]>ch)
00261       {
00262         end = mid-1;
00263         mid = (start + end)/2;
00264         continue;
00265       }
00266     }
00267 
00268     return -1;
00269   }
00270 
00274   uint32_t getSize() const
00275   {
00276     return ALPHABET_SIZE;
00277   }

00282   void setMemAddr(uint32_t index,uint32_t addr )
00283   {
00284     if (index>=ALPHABET_SIZE)
00285     {
00286       //throw exception
00287       return;
00288     }
00289 
00290     if (pNode_ == NULL)
00291     {
00292       cout<<"ERRor: alphabet node -> setMemAddr()\n";
00293     }
00294     
00295     pNode_->mem_addr_[index] = addr;
00296   }
00297 
00298   
00302   void setDiskAddr(uint32_t index,uint64_t addr )
00303   {
00304     if (index>=ALPHABET_SIZE)
00305     {
00306       //throw exception
00307       return;
00308     }
00309     if (pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[index] == addr)
00310       return;
00311     
00312     pNode_->dirty_ = true;
00313     pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[index] = addr;
00314   }
00315 
00319   void setMemAddr(CHAR_T fromCh, CHAR_T toCh, uint32_t addr )
00320   {
00321     
00322     for (uint32_t i= getIndexOf(fromCh); i<=getIndexOf(toCh); i++)
00323       if (pNode_->mem_addr_[i] != addr)
00324       {
00325         pNode_->dirty_ = true;
00326         pNode_->mem_addr_[i] = addr;
00327       }
00328   }
00329   
00333   void setDiskAddr(CHAR_T fromCh, CHAR_T toCh, uint64_t addr )
00334   {
00335     for (uint32_t i= getIndexOf(fromCh); i<=getIndexOf(toCh); i++)
00336       if (pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[i] != addr)
00337       {
00338         pNode_->dirty_ = true;
00339         pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[i] = addr;
00340       }
00341   }
00342 
00346   void setAllDiskAddr(uint64_t addr)
00347   {
00348     for (uint32_t i= 0; i<getSize(); i++)
00349       if (pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[i] != addr)
00350       {
00351         pNode_->dirty_ = true;
00352         pNode_->diskNode_.addrs_[i] = addr;
00353       }  
00354   }
00355 
00356   
00360   void setAllMemAddr(uint64_t addr)
00361   {
00362     for (uint32_t i= 0; i<getSize(); i++)
00363       if (pNode_->mem_addr_[i] != addr)
00364       {
00365         pNode_->dirty_ = true;
00366         pNode_->mem_addr_[i] = addr;
00367       }  
00368   }

00373   uint32_t getMemAddr(uint32_t index) const
00374   {
00375     return pNode_->mem_addr_[index];
00376   }

00382   uint64_t getDiskAddr(uint32_t index) const

00390   uint64_t getDiskAddr() const
00391   {
00392     return pNode_->diskPos_;
